summary.body: Am I the only one who thinks this practice is run like a processing plant and a referral agency. Does anyone know of an alternative doctor in the area who chooses to know your name and who you are and what concerns you?
summary.subject: Neaman Practice

summary.body: As a new resident to the Barbican, can anyone help me with a doctor and dentist in the area?
summary.subject: Doctor / Dentist

summary.body: Hi there, It's about time I changed my GP to a local Barbican one as I'm flying to New Zealand via Dubai and I may be arrested if the address on my prescription doesn't match my home address (that's what the Embassy just told me!). I don't fancy two months in prison like Tracy Wilkinson had to endure just for having codeine in her bloodstream or the threat of a 4 year jail term either over there.   Can anyone recommend a good, sympathetic GP around here?  Thanks!!
summary.subject: Can Anyone Recommend a Good GP?

summary.body: Hi We've just moved into the Barbican and need to register with an NHS dentist and doctor.  Does anyone have any recommendations for someone close? Thanks
summary.subject: Doctor and Dentist
